divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 5-5:30 in the afternoon. I was driving back from Stephenville, Texas in a rural area between DeLeon and Gorman, Texas and I looked toward the east field as i was headed north i came upon a bend in the road on Hwy. 6. It was a clear day and I saw a black object in the sky and it seemed like it was barly moving and I thought my eyes were playng tricks on me. It was black in color, long and rectagular in shape and appeared to have no wings. I slowed down and rolled down the window and the sound was extremly high idle but a smooth hum. I thought maybe it was a blimp but the shape was wrong. It seemed to be barly moving. It wasn't low to the ground but not as high as an airplane would be flying. I hurried home and told my wife and thought nothing more about it until the Stephenville incident came up. I was freaked out over the whole thing and I felt very erry. I have never seen a weather balloon but i'm sure it wasn't a weather balloon or blimp because of the shape. It stayed visible in my rear view mirror for the next five miles.
Summary: Witness saw a long rectagular very black object stationary in the sky
trends: There has been one other sighting in Gorman
There were no other sightings in Gorman on or around August 10th 2007
